data.content:
noun
plural -tions
the act of looking at something closely in order to learn more about it, to find problems, etc. :the act of inspecting something [noncount]
Close inspection of the candles revealed some small defects.
On closer inspection, [=when it was examined more closely] the painting proved to be a fake. [count]
The mechanic made/did a thorough inspection of the car. = The mechanic carried out a thorough inspection.
an official visit to a school, hospital, etc., in order to see if rules are being followed and things are in their proper condition [count]
Regular inspections are required of all restaurants in the area. [noncount]
The barracks are ready for inspection.

Danh từ
sự kiểm tra, sự xem xét kỹ; cuộc kiểm tra
sự thanh tra, cuộc thanh tra
